films.title: Need For Speed
films.description: It tells the story of street racer, who sets off to race cross-country as a way of avenging his friend's death at the hands of a rival racer to fullfill his prophecy.

films.title: Bullet Train
films.description: A Father, boards a bullet train in Tokyo in search of the attacker of his son . Meanwhile, guided by his handler, assassin is assigned to retrieve a briefcase full of cash from the same train with six assassin, replacing a sick colleague.

films.title: Rambo Last Blood
films.description: Vietnam War veteran tries to find some semblance of peace by raising horses on a ranch in Arizona. He's also developed a special familial bond with a woman named and her teenage granddaughter. But when a vicious Mexican cartel kidnaps the granddaughter, he crosses the border on a bloody and personal quest to rescue her and punish those responsible.

films.title: Instant Family
films.description: Feeling a void in their marriage, A couple visit a foster-care center. Two social workers, guide the hopeful parents on the path to becoming adoptive parents.
